name: A Precisely Fun Gamepad Tester
description:
GAMEPAD REQUIRED! 

(Xbox One of Xbox 360 recommended)

A (mostly) diegetic gamepad testing game made for Precision Jam.

Features

  • Fun and precise 3D toys mapped to gamepad controls
  • Comprehensive test cases for XBox One and XBox 360 Gamepads (others work too, but mapping might be different)
  • Input display with 9 decimal place precision
  • Lights and sounds
  • A pretty good time, really.
